com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.mysql.schema
Class ColumnSchema

java.lang.Object
  com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.mysql.schema.ColumnSchema

@Immutable
public final class ColumnSchema
extends Object

Stores the column metadata details for a column in a table. Internal application type used to wrap the serialized AvroColumnSchema type
